name: Weekend Drive
description: Weekend Drive is all about fun. The game is primarily a first person shooter and you can also drive vehicles. In Weekend Drive the environment is completely destructible and you can pick up and throw items, or run over enemies with your vehicle, or crash into buildings and demolish them.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, or 8, or 10 Processor: 2.4 GHZ Dual Core Processor Or Higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 460 Or Equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or 10 Processor: 2.4 GHZ Quad Core Processor Or Higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 780 Or Equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
